title: The Lore Service, dwelling at `/tmp/skogai-lore-generator`, specializes in mythology creation. It responds to commands for generating entries, books, and personas. It understands intervals and weights, adjusting its creative process according to the parameters it receives. The Small Agent Service operates through a different conduit at `./pipes/skogai-agent-small`, accepting topics as input and producing content through a three-stage pipeline: research transforms into outline, outline becomes writing.
